resources.string:
ShuleSoft is a cloud based management system for schools that aims to bring efficiency in management and interaction between students, teachers & parents. 


 www.shulesoft.com

Create and edit students\' academic reports in under 5 minutes by just inputting students\' examination scores. Be up to date with your own or your child\'s academic progress by viewing examination reports and progress charts with comments from teachers about what needs improvement.

Easily manage and keep track of school\'s financial records such as expenses and revenue. Instantly create financial statements such as the balance sheet and the income statement from the inputted data while efficiently handling things such as fees collection from parents.

Get notified when any change is made to your account. Send custom emails and free sms to parents, students or teachers concerning different issues such as meetings, unpaid or paid fees and other things happening at school.
Easily pay and receive payments via mobile payment systems such as m-pesa, airtel money and tigo-pesa without having to take payment slips to school for verification.
Enter your username or phone number
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Select your School from the dropdown below
